note: Emeritus Professor, School of Business & Management, Royal Holloway University of London. Ex-Prof Warwick Uni & Cambridge Uni. FAcSS. Monthly columnist ('Chris Grey's Brexit Britain') Byline Times. 'Brexitologist' tweeting @chrisgreybrexit, author of Brexit & Beyond Blog, a weekly analysis of Brexit news, normally on Friday morning, and author Brexit Unfolded (Biteback 2021), but expect more than Brexit here.
